title: TileImages
description: TileImages allows assembling images into a multi-dimensional array, producing a single output image. The input images must have a dimension less than or equal to the specified output image dimension.

output_image.title: Output Image
output_image.description: The path for the output tiled image.

layout.title: Layout
layout.description: Defines the structure of the tiled output image. The layout dictates the number and arrangement of input images in the output image.

input_images.title: Input Images
input_images.description: Input images to be tiled into the output image. The number of input images should match the layout specification.
